strIntroduction: Discover the history, beauty and sheer magnitude of one of the most ambitious projects ever undertaken by man. A defining moment in the history of engineering, the Panama Canal revolutionised the sailing world and is still a vital feature in global trade to this day. Led by an expert guide, you will tour the canal’s most important locks, its fascinating museums and exhibitions and finish the tour by taking in some of Panama City’s most inspiring tourist sights.
strTitle: Special Offer: Panama Canal Tour

strIntroduction: Come discover the oldest city on the shores of the Pacific Ocean, on this three hour tour of Panama Viejo and the Old Quarter of Panama City!
strTitle: Discover the City of Panama

strIntroduction: Enjoy a guided visit to Bacardi, the largest rum distillery in the world, in this full day tour. You will also have the opportunity to visit the old walled town of San Juan, one of the best preserved Spanish colonial cities in the world and the second oldest city in the Americas. The tour also includes a visit to the impressive 500 year old Fortress of San Cristobal.
strTitle: Bacardi Distillery and Old San Juan Shopping Tour

strIntroduction: Discover the second city of Puerto Rico with a day trip to captivating Ponce. With its unique architecture, laid-back vibe and colonial history, Ponce offers visitors a chance to discover Puerto Rico past and present. Wander among the splendid neoclassical and art deco buildings, linger in the shady squares and admire the sparkling fountains in this cultural and friendly city.
strTitle: Ponce Architectural City Tour

strIntroduction: This is a two-day, one-night trip to Salt Lake. You can enjoy the starry night’s reflection off the Salt Lake. You will visit the small town of Bendigo, known as the Small Golden Mountain. Then you will see Australia's third-largest Church, the Cathedral of the Sacred Heart, and enjoy the Murray River. Next you can view the small town’s plantings with abundant, flowering rapeseed plants. In this journey you will see all the beauty of Australia's dreamscape sites, and enjoy an unforgettable experience of a lifetime!
strTitle: 2-Day Melbourne Salt Lake Tour

strIntroduction: 來到以淘金熱發跡的小鎮 - 疏芬山，彷彿穿越時空回到 1850 年代，完美再現「維多利亞淘金熱」時期的街景、居民與生活風格，讓您以第三人稱的角度置身在這座小鎮。別忘了穿上你最復古、最vintage的服裝，來融入這個古色古香的城鎮吧！

strIntroduction: 風趣的中文導遊帶領您遊覽坎培拉市區，參觀新國會大廈、戰爭紀念館，為您解說這些地方背後的歷史與時代故事。拜訪維妙維肖的縮小世界--卡金頓小人國公園小人國，精緻可愛的模型讓人彷彿進入夢幻的童話世界。

strIntroduction: Grand Pacific Drive is one of the world's most beautiful highways and the best route from Sydney to Wollongong. After arriving in Jervis Bay, you will board a boat with KKday and gracefully dance with the dolphins.

strIntroduction: 藍山國家公園是世界文化遺產之一，在這片廣大的野生大地上，您能夠欣賞得天獨厚的遼闊自然美景，搭乘藍山纜車俯瞰大地，看看野生動物園裡可愛的無尾熊與袋鼠，最後拜訪溫特沃斯瀑布、三姐妹峰及珍羅蘭鐘乳石洞。
